cover: Discover our training in technologies for activism

learning.title:
Learn more about
our training!
learning.description: We have actively shared our learnings through capacity building and mentoring programs in activism for young people from Brazil's interior, here are a few examples.

1.title: MUVUCA
1.description: NOSSAS’s first climate activism program will offer training over six months to young people fighting for a viable future for our planet.

2.title: PROGRAMA DE MOBILIZADORES
2.description: People on this program will receive free training in mobilization, campaign communication and technologies for activism.

3.title: PROGRAMA DE JOVENS MOBILIZADORAS
3.description: This is a program aimed at young students in secondary education. In partnership with Girl Up! We're currently training 100 young girls about period poverty.

1.title: B.O Online para elas - Minas Gerais
1.description: The Coletivo Abertha managed to get a Virtual Police Precinct installed in Minas Gerais state after a campaign mentored by NOSSAS. Now women can file police reports without leaving home.

2.title: Revitalização do Farol - Maranhão
2.description: Former students of the Centro São José Operário, in São Luiz took part in our first training program and, through a pressure campaign, managed to get the Farol renovated, the place where community educational activities are held.

1.description: "The Programa de Jovens Mobilizadoras has been an amazing experience especially now that we released the #FreeToMenstruate campaign. The menstrual poverty, which was still very much forgotten, has now become a mobilization theme. Together we continue the fight for a fairer and more equal world for people who menstruate < 3"

2.description: "I first met NOSSAS as a campaign supporter and later through the Programa de Mobilizadores. I was amazed by the methodology developed and the generosity of sharing. I am currently part of the Rede de Mobilizadores and thanks to it we created the Licenciamento Ambiental Fica campaign."

3.description: "Being able to participate in the Programa de Jovens Mobilizadoras was one of the most remarkable experiences in my life in the activist environment. It was like taking the first step on a long road of struggle, it brought me different visions besides being able to meet several girls who share the same ideals as me about activism. Together we are stronger."
